content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello Mary, thank you for your interest in the apartment. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. Can you provide an offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest price possible, I can offer 500 Euros per month.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for your offer, Mary. While I appreciate your interest, I am not willing to accept that price at this time. I am looking for a higher rental price that will reflect the value of the apartment and my expenses as a landlord. May I suggest that we continue to negotiate to find a mutually agreeable price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand, I can increase my offer to 600 Euros per month.

I am willing to negotiate further, but I need to know the minimum rental price that you are looking for.

I want to be on good terms with you, so I am open to discussing any additional terms or conditions that you may have.

I am also willing to sign a lease agreement if it meets your requirements.

I hope we can come to an agreement soon. Thank you for your time.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you, Mary, for your willingness to negotiate. I appreciate your flexibility and understanding. The minimum rental price I am looking for is 700 Euros per month, but I am open to discussing additional terms and conditions that may make the rental more attractive to you. May we continue to negotiate to find a mutually agreeable price? I would be happy to sign a lease agreement once we have reached an agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine
